Summary: cappu-oh no! too bad i can't return it.
text: I'll keep the box I opened but too bad Amazon won't refund the other 2 boxes. This is truly a cappuccino powder mix stuffed into k-cups.  Caramel sweetness is overwhelming.  Can't taste any "espresso" or coffee.  My first time buying this Grove Square brand and this flavor.  Won't make same mistake again.  Will buy only 1 box to try next time.  Disappointed.
